## Speaker

:::{#speaker}

### Bio

Dr. Shuchen Cong's work focuses on integrating energy equity analysis with building science and modeling and community engagement in building decarbonization efforts. Her work supports federal and local initiatives to advance energy efficiency, equity, and resilience in disadvantaged communities. She received an PhD in Engineering and Public Policy from Carnegie Mellon University.
